title: Python Coding Standards
description: Enforce Python best practices including import organization, docstrings, and PEP 8 compliance

rules.title: Import Organization
rules.description: All import statements must be at the top of the file, after module docstrings and before other code

rules.title: Docstring Requirements
rules.description: All modules, classes, and functions must have docstrings following PEP 257 conventions

rules.title: PEP 8 Compliance
rules.description: Follow PEP 8 coding standards for formatting, naming conventions, and code structure

rules.title: Commit Message Format
rules.description: Use single-line commit messages that can be expanded with additional details in the body
